Title: Angels and Monsters
Plot: Claire decides to take on one of the villains herself, but she may not be as invulnerable as she believes. Nathan and Tracy search for the truth about their origins. Maya makes a shocking discovery. Hiro and Ando look for help in the most unlikely places.
GuestStars: Andre Royo, David Anders, Brea Grant, Jaime Hector, Malcolm McDowell, Alan Blumenfeld, Ashley Crow, Jessalyn Gilsig
